description: Application for non-material amendments (s96A) to the approved Legacy Communities Scheme Parameter Plans attached to planning permission 11/90621/OUTODA as varied by 14/00036/VAR:  •	PDZ6 Maximum AOD Frontage & Building Heights (LCS-DWG-APP-HGT-PAR-PDZ6-001-Revision-04); and •	PDZ6 Minimum AOD Frontage Heights (LCSDWG-APP-HGT-PAR-PDZ6-002-Revision-03).          Accompanied by a request for written approval of amendments to the PDZ6 Zonal Masterplan, approved under reference 13/00236/AOD, pursuant to          Condition LCS0.1 of the Legacy Communities Scheme planning permission 11/90621/OUTODA as varied by 14/00036/VAR: •	PDZ6 Footprint of Development Blocks (12966/ZMP-2-0001-Revision-A); •	PDZ6 Ground Floor Principal Land Uses (12966/ZMP-2-0003-Revision-B); •	PDZ6 Proportion & Distribution of Residential Units (12966/ZMP-2-0005-Revision-C); •	PDZ6 Maximum Block Heights (12966/ZMP-2-0006. Revision-B); •	PDZ6 Minimum Block Heights (12966/ZMP-2-0007-Revision -A); •	PDZ6 Location of Public Open Space, Play Spaces & Key Pedestrian & Cycle Linkages (12966/ZMP-2-0008-Revision-A); •	PDZ6 Street Layout (12966/ZMP-2-00010-Revision-A); •	PDZ6 Principles of Car Parking Provision (12966/ZMP-2-00013-Revision-A); And Revised Development Specification and Framework.
